If you join the majority of car enthusiasts in the mindset that the second-generation is one of the best and most collectible Corvettes ever made, you will not want to miss this incredible opportunity to win yourself a convertible example while, at the same time, doing a good deed. Being offered at raffle is this stunning, numbers matching
It features its original 390-horsepower 427-cid V8 engine paired with a Muncie 4-speed manual transmission and makes use of a period-correct positraction rear end with a 3.55:1 gear ratio.
click here and enter code WIN

straight and curvaceous body lines are accented by a black “singer” stripe on top of a bold Rally Red paint. A smooth vinyl upholstery covers the interior and is contrasted by masterfully polished aluminum trim. There are two included tops. A black convertible soft top and a matching auxiliary hardtop. Power steering, power 4-wheel disc brakes, and power windows are among the included options. Oh and who could forget about the side-mount chambered exhaust system pronouncing the 427’s unmistakable tone. Right down to its brightly polished wheels, this 1967 Corvette is an absolute show stopper and it would be hard to find a car collector that would not pick it to lead a collection.

Ronald McDonald House Charities has been helping children and their families since 1974. Thanks to donations they are able to help millions of families each year. You can do your part and enter to win this Stunning 1967 Corvette by making a donation today. For an added bonus, enter the
and you will get double the entries.
